CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 24, 1959, reads: "Reckless Driving - About three o'clock Saturday morning, an unidentified driver plunged into the 1948 Buick (above), owned by Ernest Moore, 7803 Hamilton Ave., and side swiped a Chevvy [sic] owned by Mrs. Charlotte Lawson, 7805 Hamilton Ave. Mrs. Lawson stated that darkness prevented the victims from seeing the driver's car license number or type of vehicle.  Mr. Moore's car was damaged beyond repair a complete loss. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: 1948 Buick owned by Ernest Moore, 7803 Hamilton Avenue, and Chevy owned by Charlotte Lawson, 7805 Hamilton Avenue, damaged in hit an run accident by unidentified driver
